overview: Sepultura at City of Rock MGM Resorts Festival Grounds, Las Vegas, NV, USA. Setlist: The Vatican / Kairos  Propaganda / Breed Apart / Manipulation of Tragedy / Dialog / Sepultura Under My Skin  Arise / Refuse/Resist / Kaiowas - Bad Horsie - Kaiowas (with Steve Vai) / Roots Bloody Roots (with Steve Vai)
title: Sepultura: Rock in Rio USA 2015
